thread.title: ANC abandons its founding principles
thread.title_full: ANC abandons its founding principles | News24

author: news24.com
title: ANC abandons its founding principles
text:
The ANC no longer abides by its charter. It no longer stands out as an independent and active political party that it used be and one that is should be.
The ANC today is seen as and regarded as a totalistic and undemocratic organisation. An organisation, not a governing party, infused with its own glorification to the detriment of sound governance. No longer do we visual their bold emblem of shield, assagi, hand, wheel and their popular black, green and yellow colours.
To visualize the ANC now, is Jacob Zuma in everyone's face like an itchy rash!
